desc: You wake up from a cryogenic state. You are on the space ship 'Exemplar'. Stepping out of the pod you feel the overwhelming sense of nausea flood over you and you stumble slightly. On the desk in front of you, you see a small bottle of medical alcohol. Do you take the Medical Alcohol?

options.title: Yes
options.response: You take the Alcohol

options.title: No
options.response: You do not take the Alcohol

options.title: Maybe later
options.response: You do not take the Alcohol

desc: Looking around, you see a Lift, a Cabinet and a Door. Do you look at the Lift, The Cabinet and the Door?

options.title: Lift
options.response: You enter the lift using your access card.

options.title: Cabinet
options.response: You open the cabinet to find an Access Card and some Health Pills

options.title: Door
options.response: Door is jammed

desc: You enter the lift; which floor do you choose, 1,2 or 3?

options.title: Floor 1
options.response: The button sparks and nothing happens

options.title: Floor2
options.response: The lift starts to slowly move upwards. Suddenly, there is a crashing sound and you fall to a lower level. You hid the ground with a thud and everything goes black...

options.title: Floor 3
options.response: The lift starts to slowly move upwards. Suddenly, there is a crashing sound and you fall to a lower level. You hid the ground with a thud and everything goes black...

desc: Waking up, you realise that you need to exit the lift. Do you call for help, try to find another exit or try to pry the door open?

options.title: Call for help
options.response: You call for help and there is no response... Moments later there is a load bashing at the door. A large khaki-coloured creature suddenly breaks through the door and snarls at you. You must fight it to survive.

options.title: Try to find another exit
options.response: You look around to find an escape hatch above you. You open it and climb ontop of the lift, you see a ladder and begin to ascend. At the top is the living quaters.

options.title: Pry the door open
options.response: The door won't budge

desc: You are on the Water Level; you explore further. Do you inspect the Water Purification Room, the Water Overseer's Room or the Maintenance Room?

options.title: Water Purification Room
options.response: You enter a to see a large array of loud machinery.

options.title: Water Maintenance Room
options.response: You enter the water Maintenance Room. Inside there are many tools hung up on the walls. Turning a corner, you see a man standing over another man. The latter is lying down motionless and the former turns in suprise upon your arrival. 'Get back! I'm warning you! the man shouts at you.

desc: Looking around, you see a Computer Terminal, a Lab Coat and a Mysterious Syringe. Which do you inspect?

options.title: Computer Terminal
options.response: You need the password.

options.title: Lab Coat
options.response: On further inspection, you notice a few blood specs on the coat. Inside the front pocket, there is a small piece of paper which reads: 'Au Pb Fe'.

options.title: Mysterious Syringe
options.response: On further inspection you see a pale blue liquid inside the syringe. You inject yourself. Suddenly you heart starts pounding and you black out. You wake up inside of a detention cell. In the cell opposite you is a large husky dog. Briskly, a man walks past you in a blood soaked lab coat, brandishing an electronic cleaver. Looking around you see a Bed and a Toothbrush.

desc: The password is one of three options. Is it: Iron Copper Lithium, Gold Helium Oxygen or Gold Lead Iron?

options.title: Iron Copper Lithium
options.response: This password is incorrect.

options.title: Gold Helium Oxygen
options.response: This password is incorrect

options.title: Gold Lead Iron
options.response: This password is correct. The terminal unlocks to display a message. It reads: 'Purple Blue Yellow'

desc: An alarm sounds and the door to the Water Purification Room shuts, trapping you in. You hear the trickling sound of water and then, suddenly, water starts to flood the room from the pipes. You see a control panel labeled 'Emergency Shut Down' The are 3 buttons, a Yellow one, a Purple one and a Blue one. You must press 3 in the correct order to stop the water!

options.title: Purple Blue Yellow
options.response: You hear a loud beep and the water valves seal just as the water reaches knee height. The door behind you opens and you go back out to the water level.

options.title: Blue Yellow Purple
options.response: The terminal locks down, clearly you got the wrong password... The room floods and you are helpess to save yourself.

options.title: Purple Yellow Blue
options.response: The terminal locks down, clearly you got the wrong password... The room floods and you are helpess to save yourself.

desc: The are numerous rooms on this floor. Do you visit Richard's Room, Lawrences's Room or the Overseer's Room?

options.title: Richard's Room
options.response: You enter Richard's Room to find the place ram shackled. There is bedding on the floor and all draws are pulled out. You cannot help but notice that there are multiple dents and scorch marks on the wall. You see a strange message on the wall, clearly written in a hurry. It reads: 'Run bef-e thy execut prjct lambda. There is nothing else of significance.

options.title: Lawrence's Room
options.response: you enter Lawrence's room. It is an average room sporting a large back window. Through the window you see a large, shaded moon. There is a starnge red glow about the moon and you cannot help but wonder; what happened here? You see nothing else of interest so you leave.

options.title: The Overseer's Room
options.response: You enter the Overseer's room and immediately notice a Revolver on the desk. You take the weapon and leave as there does not seem to be anything else of significance here. You exit the level through the stairs and make your way down to the water level.

desc: Do you inspect the bed, inspect the toothbrush or call for help.

options.title: Inspect the bed
options.response: It is a basic bed

options.title: Inspect the toothbrush
options.response: The toothbrush might come in handy; you pocket it

options.title: Call for help
options.response: The man rushes up to you cell, cleaver in hand. He starts to approach you and you have the feeling that he has a bad intent.

desc: Do you; crawl into bed and cry, stab the man in the eye with the toothbrush or jump at the man?

options.title: Crawl into bed and cry
options.response: The man grabs you by your neck and stabs at you. You bleed out and die.

options.title: Jab him in the eye with a toothbrush
options.response: The man was not expecting this. You jab the toothbrush directly into his eye causing him to collapse in pain. You take his cleaver and stumble out of the cell. TO BE CONTINUED...

options.title: Jump at the man
options.response: The man grabs you by your neck and stabs at you. You bleed out and die.

options.title: Crawl into bed and cry
options.response: The man grabs you by your neck and stabs at you. You bleed out and die.

options.title: Jab him in the eye with a toothbrush
options.response: The man was not expecting this. You jab the toothbrush directly into his eye causing him to collapse in pain. You take his cleaver and stumble out of the cell. TO BE CONTINUED...

options.title: Jump at the man
options.response: The man grabs you by your neck and stabs at you. You bleed out and die.

desc: Do you attempt to calm her down, try to get the gun or threaten her?

options.title: Attempt to calm her down
options.response: She ignores you and keeps pointing the gun at you

options.title: Attempt the get the gun
options.response: The woman panics and fires the gun. She misses you however she hits the glass window behind you. The glass is covered in growing cracks. There is little time before the window will break, sucking you out into space. You must think quickly to escape. TO BE CONTINUED...

options.title: Threaten her
options.response: 'You leave me no choice' she says and she shoots you in the chest. Everything goes black. You have died.

desc: Do you attempt to tie the man up, attack him or let him go?

options.title: Attempt to tie the man up
options.response: Trying to tackle the man, he slips past you running out of the room. 'I'll get you for this!' he calls after you. The door slams shut and you hear a hissing sound. The air is being sucked out of your room! You must act quickly to survive. TO BE CONTINUED...

options.title: Attack him
options.response: You engage the man in combat

options.title: Let them go
options.response: The man runs off without a word. The door slams shut and you hear a hissing sound. The air is being sucked out of your room! You must act quickly to survive. TO BE CONTINUED...

desc: You have successfully defeated the man. Brushing him down, you find an ID card. It says the mans name was Harvey Quinn. You try to leave the room but the door slams shut and you hear a hissing sound. The air is being sucked out of your room! You must act quickly to survive. Do you try to get into the vent, try to hack into the door through the terminal or call for help?

options.title: Try to enter the vents
options.response: You try to enter the vents. TO BE CONTINUED...

options.title: Hack the door
options.response: You run over to the terminal. TO BE CONTINUED...

options.title: Call for help
options.response: There is no response
